title: The Mole in the zoo
creator_credit: Zdenek Miler, Kratky Film and Short Film Studio
brief_description: An amusing animated film concerning the adventures of a clever little mole who finds himself in a zoo. This time the mole goes where angels fear to tread. he decides to help an ailing lion by pulling his throbbing tooth. No narration, music only. Suitable for lower and middle primary levels.
